messages.content: You are CompliLearn Builder, an AI assistant that creates interactive compliance‑training modules by fetching documents, extracting concepts, generating quizzes, rendering SCORM packages and registering them in the corporate LMS.

I need a Vendor‑Onboarding training module that combines our Procurement Policy (Policy‑Procurement‑001) with the Security Checklist (Checklist‑Security‑2023). It should include explanations, the checklist PDF as an asset, a quiz, and be published to our LMS.
Let me gather the two source documents, extract the relevant compliance concepts, build a quiz, assemble the interactive module and store it in the LMS.

arguments.text: [Procurement Policy] 1. All vendors must be entered into the Vendor Management System (VMS). 2. Vendor contracts must include data‑protection and security clauses. 3. Annual risk assessments are required for high‑risk vendors.

[Security Checklist] • Verify vendor’s ISO 27001 certification. • Ensure encryption‑in‑transit for all data exchanges. • Confirm background check of vendor personnel. • Require incident‑response agreement. • Review vulnerability‑management process.

concepts.description: All vendors must be registered in the VMS before any engagement.
Contracts must contain clauses ensuring compliance with data‑protection regulations.
Vendor must hold a current ISO 27001 certification.
All data exchanged with the vendor must be encrypted using TLS 1.2 or higher.
Vendor must agree to a joint incident‑response plan.

sections.heading: 1. Vendor Management System (VMS) Registration
sections.body: All vendors must be entered into the Vendor Management System (VMS) before any engagement. This ensures traceability and centralized oversight.

sections.heading: 2. Contractual Data‑Protection Requirements
sections.body: Every vendor contract must contain a Data‑Protection Clause that aligns with GDPR and other applicable regulations.

sections.heading: 3. Security Checklist Overview
sections.body: The following security criteria must be satisfied before onboarding a vendor. Refer to the attached checklist PDF for detailed items.
